metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1699 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A path traversal flaw was found in the Ceph dashboard implemented in upstream versions v14.2.5, v14.2.6, v15.0.0 of Ceph storage and has been fixed in versions 14.2.7 and 15.1.0. An unauthenticated attacker could use this flaw to cause information disclosure on the host machine running the Ceph dashboard.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
